biblionumber.description: Local biblionumber of the original record being overlayed

timestamp.description: When this batch overlay operation was executed

operation.description: name of the batch overlay operation

ruleName.description: name of the overlaying rule used, found from syspref 'BatchOverlayRules'

diff.description: a JSON serialized diff of the overlayed record changes or a error description

headers.description: Descriptions of the records used in the overlaying action, in the same order as presented in the diff.
